alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 3:56AM AKST until November 10 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Haines Borough and Klukwan and City and Borough of Juneau. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Uncertainty in snow amounts still exist especially around Juneau as surface winds could cause temperatures to warm quicker than expected leading to lesser amounts. On the other hand, if temperatures fail to warm through the afternoon, amounts could be greater. At this time, expect snow to change to rain or a mix by late Thursday afternoon around Juneau and Haines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan
